ns0:Concept.displayName: Belladonna Alkaloids 16.2 MG / Opium 30 MG Rectal Suppository
Belladonna Alkaloids 16.2 MG / Opium 60 MG Rectal Suppository

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of RxNorm codes is intended to capture orders of any medication containing Belladonna or tincture of opium.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are prescribed Belladonna/Opium (B/O) or tincture of opium.),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNorm codes associated with B/O and tincture of opium are included in the value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Medications without B/O or tincture of opium are excluded from the value set.)
